long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🏳️‍⚧️ A user-friendly Google Chrome extension for automatically removing and replacing deadnames.

🔁 This is a good REPLACEMENT for the extension "Deadname remover" by Ari Gibson, which is no more compatible with recent Chrome Manifest version.

⚙️ After installation, a settings page will open where you can customize your name and deadname preferences.

⏳ To adjust settings later or temporarily disable the extension, click the trans flag icon in the top right corner of your browser.

****
🏳️‍⚧️ A deadname refers to the birth or previous name of a transgender or non-binary person that they no longer use after transitioning to a new name that aligns with their gender identity. 

****
✨ More extension by Nicolas Micaux: https://chromewebstore.google.com/search/micaux.nicolas

- This extension is compatible with Manifest V3
- Credits goes to original author Ari Gibson 🙏
